title: Not ONLY does the Aatrox Victorious Skin look bad but....
body:
I don't think he deserves even gameplay wise either.

Why is he getting it? He has nerfed so much that by the time world's began he was not picked barely ever. Have you seen him in group stages doing well? No he was 33% win rate.

He didn't shake the meta up nor was he a "surprise" to anyone. since every rework you do is absurdly overpowered at their conception which was around the start of worlds; and by the end of it has been nerfed to oblivion. He fits no bill that previous victorious skins typically fill.

Some Victorious skins make sense, Graves, Maokai, Sivir all made their mark on their seasons. Aatrox? Honestly I forgot he existed... pretty much same as pre-rework Aatrox, that honestly at this point I prefer his old version, was fun to play. 

Off the top of my head a pick that didn't seem as obvious, hasn't been picked in worlds very often before, and is doing quite well in Nautilus. In fact he hasn't been buffed since 9.8, meaning his success right now is because of the need for him in the meta not because you absurdly buffed him right before worlds. Plus he doesn't have a skin that looks EXACTLY like the Victorious skin theme already and lacks any really good skin and *ahem* doesn't already have like, a prestige skin already...

Or I don't know, Gragas? 66% win rate in worlds with a 29% play rate, with a nerf in 9.11 and last real buff not **since patch 8.7**. Not only that, when a Gragas does do well, its usually because of an amazing ultimate that is actually really hype in a worlds scene. 

But no. Aatrox "victorious skin". Something tells me that in the final worlds match Aatrox won't even be played. But I am willing to bet we'll see a Gragas or Nautilus, played by the best of the best with some actual hype plays.

So while everyone *rightfully* is bagging the design of Victorious Aatrox, even if it did look absolutely amazing I do not think Aatrox is a good pick at all for the Victorious skin line, and honestly I'm a bit appalled that you'd waste it like this. Especially when skins like Victorious Elise, Sivir, Maokai, and Graves actually look really nice and I enjoy playing them even if they aren't my favorite champs.

New Aatrox is a bigger balance problem than old Aatrox ever was. He sucks balls.

Well, lets look at the reason why Aatrox was such a high priority pick and a "problem".

1. He is first pickable and blind pickable.
2. He lanes fine against ranged.
3. He can get lane priority early on in the game.
4. He is one of the now dying race of snowballing top laners.
5. He has a high skill cap and potentially very high damage.

Aatrox not having any actual big counter match ups is one of the things that made him strong, thus they tried to introduce Kled as one of his counters by adding a 60% grievous wounds to his pull. However this really didn't change anything. Also he isn't able to be abused by ranged which is insanely important because this is a meta where Karma was commonly picked top lane. Aatrox being able to get lane priority ( can clear waves fast ) is very important in pro play for many reasons. Him being a snowballing top laner is also important to his identity because it makes him incontestable in both side lanes and team fights. After Aatrox's gut Renekton has taken his place, as they share many things. Mainly points 4 and 3. Point 5 just means that he is going to be more effective in pro play than in solo que due to the skill it takes to unlock all of his damage.

Aatrox being a snowballing top laner is probably the main thing that made him strong in pro play. It basically allows you to play off your top lane rather than your bot lane. However in clown fiesta solo que people just play for themselves so this isn't relevant. IMO Aatrox wasn't a big balance problem at all, he just has things other champions SHOULD have. Aatrox and Renekton seriously shouldn't be the only good team fighting top laners. In season 10 they plan on giving top laners more EXP and they think it will help them carry, but it truely is the CHAMPIONS that are holding top laners back from being able to carry. There is only a single real scaling top laner and it is Jax. And Jax is insanely strong ATM for carrying games. Abusing him is how most of the top laners that are in challenger got to challenger. People talk about "how does top lane have no influence if TFBlade can get rank one" its because of Jax.

We don't need to nerf Aatrox, we need to rework the other top laners.

In the[ Ask Riot for Victorious Skins](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/11/ask-riot-victorious-champions/), rule 5 states that if they have any major balance changes they wouldn't be eligible.

On [May 1st, 2019 patch 9.9](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-99-notes) was released with a bunch of changes, and was immediately hotfixed, and continues to be a balancing hassle to this day. Quick notes:

1. P: No longer reduces healing/shielding by 40%, 25% healing off minions rather than 100%\*, now reduces Q's CD on auto and tipping.
2. E: Single charge, removed AD steroid, longer CD\*, more sustain.
3. R: Removed revive\*, amps self heal only\*, reworked in 9.9, Duration changes, Bonus AD changes

\* From later (Except E, the Longer CD was from end of 2018).

I have no opinions on Victorious that haven't already been voiced, but I believe he was the wrong choice. He was highly volatile in the summer split because he was a super safe top-laner that had great sustain, a get-out-gank free card via revive before and post 9.9 and easily proc'd the over-tuned Conqueror's rune. He was THE champion to be abused by pros and in soloQ. I can't think or remember a time Aatrox during the pro scene actually did something cool or defining because he's just become Renekton. You've seen one Aatrox, you've seen them all.

They always preach that W/L and P/B don't mean anything for balance unless it's severe so it's shameful that the Victorious this year was defined solely on the fact he was P/B'd for the entire summer split because he was toxic to fight against.

The most I've seen a Aatrox do this summer split is kill deny, out-sustain, and run away like a coward for 3 seconds while he revives.

The only thing Aatrox did was make S8 worlds less entertaining than watching paint dry.

Every single game was Aatrox vs Urgot.

I do understand their reasoning why he was picked. I don't think they could ever troll us harder than Victorioius Mao'kai.

Victorious skins are picked very early in the season, and around that time Aatrox was all that anyone was talking about. Riot thinks it's because people loved him, but really it was because we hated how broken his new design was. Aatrox fans weren't happy, especially now that he's joined the list of champions that are too broken to be viable for solo queue, and the rest of us certainly weren't happy that we were getting stuck with another 'must first pick or ban' champion that Riot loves to release.

Picking Aatrox was a slap in the face to us all and proves that they don't pay attention to what we say. 

That's why I'm annoyed with. I've been getting Gold since season 5 for rewards. The reason I did that was because I looked at the Victorious skins for Elise and Morgana and really loved them. Lately their Victorious skins have been crap in comparison to those, so I don't know why I bother anymore. I pretty much expect all the Victorious skins to be pretty meh now, but I wonder how such an obvious mistake got past several stages of people. That skin objectively looks like Justicar Aatrox, and that's a big oof on the part of the design team.

I think the new Aatrox would be fine if they just went back to how he was a dozen or so patches ago and lowered some numbers. 

Previously his passive reduced healing and shields instead of being a discount GotU, he had 2 charges on his dash and it briefly gave him bonus AD. And of course his ultimate gave him a revive on take down rather than just being "gain AD, lifesteal and MS" like a knock off Riven ult.

What we have now is a stripped down, bland bundle of stats that heals when it does literally anything. Riot chose to take the lazy way out instead of keeping the Aatrox rework actually interesting and needing to use more than 2 brain cells to make it balanced.
I may be one trick, but Leona deserved it. Or Brain or Thresh. Give it to a damn support.__
